name: mithril-dev
description: Mithril development environment with built-in msx, fastclick, stylus, jade, babel or coffeescript, auto-prefixing, inline styles and browser reload

scripts.css-prefixer: postcss -u autoprefixer -o src/tmp/main-prefixed.css src/main.css && npm run inline-index
scripts.make-directories: mkdir -p src/assets src/pages src/vendor src/tmp build/pages
scripts.watch-index: DEBUG=onchange onchange src/index.html src/main.css -- npm run index-inline-css
scripts.pages-inline-css: cd src/pages; for html in *.html; do inline-styles $html > ../../build/pages/$html; done;
scripts.watch-pages: DEBUG=onchange onchange src/pages/*.html src/pages/*.css -- npm run pages-inline-css
scripts.main-stylus: stylus --out src/ --use autoprefixer-stylus --with "{ browsers: ['last 3 versions'] }" src/main.styl
scripts.pages-stylus: stylus --out src/pages/ --use autoprefixer-stylus --with "{ browsers: ['last 3 versions'] }" src/pages/*.styl
scripts.do-stylus: npm run main-stylus & npm run pages-stylus
scripts.main-stylus-watch: DEBUG=onchange onchange src/main.styl -- npm run main-stylus
scripts.pages-stylus-watch: DEBUG=onchange onchange src/pages/*.styl -- npm run pages-stylus
scripts.styles-stylus-watch: DEBUG=onchange onchange src/styles/*.styl -- npm run do-stylus
scripts.watch-styles: npm run main-stylus-watch & npm run pages-stylus-watch & npm run styles-stylus-watch &
scripts.pages-babel: cd src/pages; for script in *.js; do browserify --verbose -t stringify -t babelify $script -o ../../build/pages/$script; done;
scripts.pages-watchify: cd src/pages; for script in *.js; do watchify --verbose -t stringify -t babelify $script -o ../../build/pages/$script; done;
scripts.watch-js: npm run app-watchify & npm run pages-watchify &
scripts.watch-everything: npm run watch-styles & npm run watch-assets & npm run watch-vendor & npm run watch-js & npm run watch-pages & npm run watch-index &
scripts.prep: npm run clean && npm run make-directories && npm run copy-assets && npm run copy-vendor
scripts.build: npm run prep && npm run do-stylus && npm run index-inline-css && npm run bundle-babel && npm run pages-inline-css && npm run pages-babel
scripts.dev: npm run build && npm run watch-everything && npm run browser-sync
scripts.watch: npm run watch-everything && npm run browser-sync

author: pelonpelon
